Module slogo_team01
Package view

Interface MovementView

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    View
    public interface MovementView
    This view is concerned with methods that change what the user sees on the screen. Any form of movement that might take place via a call from another class.
    Author:
    Ben Lawrence, Khian Wei Goh, Joshua Medway, Sumer Vardhan

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addLine​(int index, Coordinate start, Coordinate end)
      Tells the view to add al line for the turtle with the given index starting and ending at the given coordinates
      void moveTurtle​(int turtleIndex, Coordinate start, Coordinate end)
      Tells the view to move the turtle with the given index from the start coordinate to the end coordinate
      void rotateTurtle​(int turtleIndex, double degrees)
      Tells the view to rotate a turtle with the given index

    • Method Detail

      • addLine

        void addLine​(int index,
             Coordinate start,
             Coordinate end)
        Tells the view to add al line for the turtle with the given index starting and ending at the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        index - - integer turtle index whose movement has drawn the line
        start - - coordinate start value in slogo coordinate system
        end - - coordinate end value in slogo coordinate system

      • moveTurtle

        void moveTurtle​(int turtleIndex,
                Coordinate start,
                Coordinate end)
        Tells the view to move the turtle with the given index from the start coordinate to the end coordinate
        Parameters:
        turtleIndex - - integer index of turtle to move
        start - - coordinate from which the turtle starts in slogo coordinate system
        end - - coordinate from which the turtle ends

      • rotateTurtle

        void rotateTurtle​(int turtleIndex,
                  double degrees)
        Tells the view to rotate a turtle with the given index
        Parameters:
        turtleIndex - - integer index of turtle to be rotated
        degrees - - double number of degrees to rotate the turtle clockwise
